Articles.Content: When i am playing career mode all works fine for me, until yesterday when i must revert a flight. I pushed the ''Revert Flight '' button then it just pop up the revert flight information, not the two buttons of where i will revert to. I transmitted the mystery goo data, but it just also show up the info, not the buttons. It works fine in sandbox mode, i can revert flight, but not in the career mode. Can someone help me?
Can we have some pictures? What mods are you using? Do you have reverting flights turned off in the difficulty settings?

I dont have revert flights turned off, and i am using 30+ mods, almost 40.

How can i move a Picture here?

1 hour ago, Retrograde115 said:

Can we have some pictures? What mods are you using? Do you have reverting flights turned off in the difficulty settings?
You can ONLY revert a flight as long as you have stayed with your ship all the way from launch. If you have changed scenes or have loaded a savegame revert will no longer be possible.

I know i know, but i mean i do this when i have stayed With my ship all the time, i have possibility to push the revert flight button, but when i push it, it just show up ''Revert flight, revertin flight will...'' but not the buttons!!!
